Title: Pygmalion
Writer: George Bernard Shaw (screen play and dialogue), W.P. Lipscomb (scenario), Cecil Lewis (scenario)
Actors: Leslie Howard, Wendy Hiller, Wilfrid Lawson, Marie Lohr
Plot: The snobbish & intellectual Professor of languages, Henry Higgins makes a bet with his friend that he can take a London flower seller, Eliza Doolittle, from the gutters and pass her off as a society lady. However he discovers that this involves dealing with a human being with ideas of her own.
